attributes.action: Control the use of over-bright car headlights which cause excessive driving stress and light pollution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no need for the level of brightness emitted by some modern road cars. If the driver's eyesight is that bad they should not be driving. The only result of this increase in brightness is increased stress for other road users as they are blinded, and also unnecessary light pollution of our planet. The government should take control and apply a limit on this new 'I'm alright jack' phenomena.
